title: The Spoon Isn't Real...
description: Amazfit Arc -   FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -

But I do have a product today, and we're gonna test it in an unconventional way... ...because, we're Canadian. The company's called "AmazFit" and the tracker is called "Arc". It's got a heart rate monitor on it. I'm hoping it's kinda durable. It also says on the back it's IP67, so, water resistant. Dust, rain, splashing. How about ice?! Actually, kinda sleek.
